subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Genuine Risk, one of only three fillies to win the Kentucky Derby, died Monday morning at the Virginia farm of her owners, Bert and Diana Firestone. She was 31. The oldest living Kentucky Derby winner at the time of her death, Genuine Risk seemed to be in good health through the early morning hours Monday. An autopsy was not ordered.
